data.event: Founded in 1848, Padua is one of the oldest communities in the region.

event.title: was established in Padua on July 27, 1882

data.event: A post office was established in Padua on July 27, 1882 and operated for approximately twenty years: after it was discontinued on August 31, 1903, the community's mail was sent through the Fort Recovery post office.
